author: boisvert
msg: BUILDR-508 Remove unnecessary use of Java.classpath in OpenJPA extension

author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-1511: SELECT clause without a WHERE, causes an Exception when
extracting a Blob from a database
Disable bulk fetching for table scans that fetch BLOB or CLOB columns,
if the cursor is holdable, as the large objects in the internal buffer
will not survive across transaction boundaries.

author: pamarcelot
msg: Removed default ldif directory (which is no longer standard and needs to be configured before the launched of the server in the LDIF configuration file).
